review: The game play looks amazing, game play itself is not fun. They also held back units and pushed them out as a DLC. The game developers are greedy horrible people, I feel cheated (which is how EVERYONE else who bought this game feels, go read other reviews).Go spend your money on Supreme Commander: Forged Alliance, you will be much happier,
